User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the FocusFlow application.

UserPreferences.title: UserPreferences
UserPreferences.description: Stores user-specific preferences for the FocusFlow application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user preferences.

theme.description: The user's chosen theme (e.g., neon-blue, cyberpunk-purple).

blurIntensity.description: The intensity of the Glassmorphism blur effect (e.g., high, medium, low).

antiBurnIn.description: Whether the anti-burn-in 'DVD screensaver' mode is enabled.

shortBreakDuration.description: Custom short break duration in minutes.

longBreakDuration.description: Custom long break duration in minutes.

weekStartsOn.description: The day the week starts on (0=Sun, 1=Mon, etc.).

FocusRecord.title: FocusRecord
FocusRecord.description: Represents a single focus session record for a user on a specific date.

id.description: Unique identifier for the focus record.

date.description: The date of the focus record in YYYY-MM-DD format.

totalFocusMinutes.description: Total focus minutes for the day.

totalPomos.description: Total Pomodoro sessions completed for the day.

Session.title: Session
Session.description: Represents a single focus session within a focus record.

startTime.description: The start time of the session (timestamp).

endTime.description: The end time of the session (timestamp).

duration.description: The duration of the session in minutes.

type.description: The type of session (e.g., pomodoro, countdown).

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. Access is restricted to the authenticated user.

/users/{userId}/userPreferences/{userPre.description: Stores user preferences. Access is restricted to the authenticated user.

/users/{userId}/focusRecords/{focusRecor.description: Stores daily focus records for each user. Access is restricted to the authenticated user.
Stores individual sessions within a focus record. Access is restricted to the authenticated user.
